title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.14 - Audit of procurement forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.14 - Audit of procurement forms

State Regulations

The Division of Standards and Purchase shall examine each
vendor's State CDC form No. 1 and invoice and upon finding them to be in order
and the price satisfactory, shall promptly certify the same for payment to the
vendor by the State Department of Audit and Control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
